it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.server

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.server.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameController class is the controller of the application, it manages all the connections with users and dialogue with the GameState to control the game flow.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController(int id,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pc,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Handler> hand)
        Parameters:
        id - the Id of the current game, since more game can be run in parallel
        pc - an Hashmap that maps the names of the player and a String that describes the type of the connection
        hand - an Hashmap that maps the names of the player and a reference to the connection handler

      • askForLights

        public Coordinates askForLights(java.lang.String name,
                                boolean reask)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Via handler ask user to input the coordinates of the sector he wants to enlight
        Parameters:
        name - user's name
        reask - signals if game controller is reasking the input because not valid
        Returns:
        A Coordinate object with the selected coordinates
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException - if can't reach client

                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                          java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        playername - the card user
        cardname - the type of card used
        usemessage - the message the describes the card used

      • decreaseHumansAndCheck

        public void decreaseHumansAndCheck(Player player)
        Decrease the number of humans in game and check if was the last one on the ship (end game condition)
        Parameters:
        player - the player that has escaped or has been killed

      • manageDisconnection

        public void manageDisconnection(java.lang.String playername)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method called when some other method detect a disconnection, it closes the missing connection and notify to all the players remained who left the game
        Parameters:
        playername - the player whose connection has fallen
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if can't reach the players still in game

      • notifyMessageToAll

        public void notifyMessageToAll(java.lang.String message)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send a generic in-game message to all the users connected
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if can't reach some player

      • notifyOfEscape

        public void notifyOfEscape(boolean escaped,
                           Player player)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Notify to all the other players the failed or succeeded escape of a player
        Parameters:
        escaped - signals if the escape has succeeded
        player - the player who escaped
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if can't reach some player

      • sayByeToLosers

        public void sayByeToLosers(java.lang.String dead,
                           java.lang.String killer)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send a game-over message to a killed player and then removes his player instance from the GameState
        Parameters:
        dead - the name of the killed player
        killer - the name of the player who killed the user contacted
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if can't reach the user

        Set a new GameState in GameController, used only for test purposes
        Parameters:
        gamestate - the new GameState

      • showLights

        public void showLights(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String lightposition,
                       java.lang.String playersinbox)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Send an in-game message containing the description of all the players that are in the position enlighted by the user with a LightsCard
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player who used the LightsCard
        lightposition - string representing the coordinates of the selected position
        playersinbox - string representing all the players that are in the selected box
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException - if can't reach the user
